org.nzdis.micro.messaging

Class SocketAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.messaging.SocketAddress

  • public class SocketAddress
extends java.lang.Object
    SocketAddress serves as a mechanism to produces a consistent String-based socket address representation for internal platform purposes as well as its conversion to a Java SocketAddress.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $ $Date: 2010/11/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz
